channel.title: SFoL65: Reminiscence Of Adiart Village Classcard - Thieves Guild HQ
channel.description:
***"Yesterday, you heard bad news. The Adventure Party has appeared that according to intel, they intent to get rid off you in one feel swoop. What makes things worse, some of the Villagers are planning to go against you despire all your threats. The emergency meeting was called in order to discuss about solutions on upcoming crisis."***
## <S> Shurian: </S> > # [color=Gold]Schemer[/color] :shield: :star: > [color=Gold]**Thieves Guild Special**[/color] *"You're the criminal mastermind that serves as brains in your group."* **Working In The Shadows (Passive)** - Unless you’re the last alive member of the Thieves Guild, you cannot perform a factional kill. Corrupt Chief doesn’t count towards last alive member of the Thieves guild. **Clever Organizer (Passive)** - While you’re alive, your teammates can perform a normal action alongside with factional kill. **Polite Yet Two-Faced (Passive)** - You appear as Villager for investigators. **Obstruct (Day)** - Select a player. Until next day, they will receive no feedback if any and disables all day abilities used on target. - 2 uses **Advanced Planning (Day)** - Select a teammate. Their actions would be guaranteed to succeed the following night. - 2 uses >_Defeat the Villagers and the Blue Dragon._
## <S> Cheeki: </S> > # [color=Gold]Counterfeiter[/color] :speech_balloon: > [color=Gold]**Thieves Guild Social**[/color] *"You're master at deception in more ways than one."* **Perfect Crime (Passive)** - While performing factional kill, if you killed your target their class and logs won’t be shown to anyone beside yourself. **Framed! (Day)** - Select a player. If someone dies the next night, make it look like they visited them. If more than 1 player died last night, it will prioritize factional kill. - 2 uses **Forged Papers (Night)** - Make your teammate appear as a Villager. - 2 uses >_Defeat the Villagers and the Blue Dragon._
## <S> ATNoName: </S> > # [color=Gold]Mugger[/color] :wine_glass: > [color=Gold]**Thieves Guild Offensive**[/color] >*"You're a first-class brute, even if you aren't very smart you can make it up with your muscles."* **Frenzy (Passive)** - While performing factional kill, you have occupy and redirection immunity. It cannot be bypassed. **Yoink! (Day)** - Remove 1 use from each target’s abilities. You can't use it Day 1. - 2 uses **Stunning Fist (Night)** - Occupy a player. - Infinite uses >_Defeat the Villagers and the Blue Dragon._
## <S> Leafia: </S> > # [color=Gold]Drug Dealer[/color] :shield: :dagger: > [color=Gold]**Thieves Guild Killer**[/color] *"You're illegal drug trafficer that is very known for possesing different type of drugs.* **Deadly Drug (Passive)** - While performing factional kill, your attack bypasses healing. **Substance Delivery (Day)** - Select one of the following effects, 4 uses: :crown: >* Make a player bleed, they will die after 2 nights unless healed. >* Poison a player, they will die after 3 nights unless healed. They won’t be informed. > >_Defeat the Villagers and the Blue Dragon._

item.dc:creator: WindwardAway
item.description:
Leafia:

Wind would be a good chief for us since I’m in her towncore so I’m pretty sure that I’ll be able to pocket her pretty easily.

you forget I have extreme pocket paranoia :^)

Shurian:

/advance planning on @Leafia

ah so Marl and I were right

We need Arctic dead or he might ruin everything for us.

item.title: SFoL65: Reminiscence Of Adiart Village Classcard - Thieves Guild HQ
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
@ATNoName
*Knock Knock
“You were visited by masked stranger and they would like to offer an transaction if you’re interested.”

Then he showed you his wares:

  • #1 Item - 3 Gold Coins
  • #2 Item - 2 Gold Coins
  • #3 Item - 1 Gold Coin

The offer lasts the entire night.

Note: You can buy more than 1 item as long as you have coins.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL65: Reminiscence Of Adiart Village Classcard - Thieves Guild HQ
item.dc:creator: ATNoName
item.description:
Leafia, if you read this, I want you to improve on two things:

  1. take your time and read whats happening regardless of alignment. This isn’t an RTS or a shooter game where you need to be on your toes at all times. You have 48/36 hours to do something and I guarantee that nobody will be able to use the entire 48/36 hours effectively.

  2. stop outting scum mech. You aren’t gonna get towncred and it look super awkward when you present it. It’s also ok to be wrong about since it’s not like TOS or TOL where you get exed for not understanding said mech.

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL65: Reminiscence Of Adiart Village Classcard - Thieves Guild HQ
